Body:
"""
        Test that a ValueError gets raised when a required GetResponsePayload
        field is missing when encoding the struct.
        """
payload = payloads.GetResponsePayload(object_type=enums.ObjectType.
    SYMMETRIC_KEY, unique_identifier='49a1ca88-6bea-4fb2-b450-7e58802c3038')
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
args = stream,
self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, 'Payload is missing the secret field.',
    payload.write, *args)
